title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Personalize customer experiences at scale w/ AI-powered Amazon Connect (BIZ219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的Amazon Connect大规模个性化客户体验 (BIZ219)
abstract: Customers today expect personalized and relevant service at every touchpoint in their journey. Join this session to hear from AWS and your peers how you can gain a 360-degree customer view with Amazon Connect - utilizing advanced analytics and AI-driven capabilities to centralize digital outbound campaigns, empower agents with unified experiences, and proactively engage customers. Walk away with insights on how to turn casual customers into passionate advocates through personalized interactions and streamlined operations.
abstract_cn: 当今客户期望在其旅程的每个触点都能获得个性化和相关的服务。加入本次会议，聆听AWS和您的同行分享如何通过Amazon Connect获得360度客户视图——利用高级分析和AI驱动的能力来集中管理数字化外呼活动，为座席提供统一的体验，并主动与客户互动。您将了解如何通过个性化互动和简化运营，将普通客户转变为热情的拥护者。
